page.title: 17RECREATION, TEAM GAME
page.content: The games we play in 1985 vary a lot. The sporty type games like tennis, rounders and netball are a lot different to board games and card games we play at home. Rounders is a game we enjoy playing in school. There are nine players in each team. Each has a position. There are two teams - one fielding, one batting. The batters have to hit the ball that the bowler has thrown and run round the bases to fourth to score a rounder for their team, which is the object of the game. The fielders have to try to stop them. THe bases are arranged in a semi-circle. Two basic rules of the game are that you are not allowed to cut across the playing area, but you have to run round not necessarily stopping at each. If you hit the ball behind, you can only run to first base.
